name: Triveum
description: Triveum (TRV) blockchain will be built on an ultra fast blockchain with low fees. It will consist of an underlying ecosystem with projects spanning DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and more. Triveum will become the fastest, most secure and scalable blockchain ecosystem with lowest fee. Key Triveum features include a layer 1 blockchain with a NFT marketplace, DEX swap, wallet, staking, DAPPs and bridge to mainnet TRV chain.
